name: Heymandi - Anonymous Chat
description: What you say is who you are. Match with a new friend in NO time.    Indulge in an appearance-free world with your heart and inner self  Stay Private   Show your gender optionally, find the right person   Meet someone with similar interest  Find out who is geographically around you  GET READY TO HEYMANDI?  No Profile, No Image, No Burden. What you say is who you are.  Meet new friends in seconds. Fast and Mysterious.   POST. INVITE. CHAT. As simple as that.  Looking for more features? Upgrade to Hey Plus to enjoy your superpower.  Get 5 more chatrooms, talk to more friends simultaneously. Traceback who invited you and talk to them again. Enjoy meeting new friends ads Free.  -----------------------------------  If you choose to purchase Hey Plus, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in Google Play after purchase. Current Hey Plus subscription price is from $9.99 US/month, one-month, six-months, and one-year packages are available. Prices are in USD, may vary in countries other than the U.S., and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.  If you dont choose to purchase Hey Plus, you can simply continue using Heymandi for free.  Heymandi Privacy Policy https://heymandi.com/privacy  Heymandi User Terms https://heymandi.com/terms
